message.content:
cs.SI, cs.SD, cs.SY, cs.LG, cs.DS 

Reasoning: 
1. cs.SI (Social and Information Networks) - The paper investigates sentiment detection in a large social network, which falls under the scope of cs.SI. 
2. cs.SD (Software Engineering) - The paper may also fall under cs.SD as it involves modeling and analyzing the accuracy of sentiment detection algorithms. 
3. cs.SY (Systems and Control) - The paper may fall under cs.SY as it involves analyzing the impact of external influence on a system (the social network) and its detection accuracy. 
4. cs.LG (Machine Learning) - The paper may fall under cs.LG as it involves modeling user sentiments using an Ising Markov random field model, which is a machine learning technique. 
5. cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) - The paper may fall under cs.DS as it involves analyzing the impact of network structure and parameters on sentiment detection accuracy, which may involve the use of algorithms and data structures.
